Desc.entry: An Anglican/Baptist church, St Thomas Philadelphia is a city church with a mission to reach across Sheffield with the good news of God's love. St Thomas Philadelphia is joined together with the Kings Centre, a house church community in Nether Edge, to become one church working out of two main sites.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 10am-5pm (office times), Sun at 10.30am (family service), 6.30pm (evening worship)
